Uses of Class
transaction.Account

    • Uses of Account in transaction

      Subclasses of Account in transaction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Checking
      Checking is an Account subclass that waives monthly fees if the account has direct deposit Checking Accounts have an annual interest rate of 0.05% and a monthly fee of $25 but is waived if the balance is $1,500.
      class  MoneyMarket
      Money Market is an Account subclass that Cannot waive fees if the number of withdrawals exceed 6.
      class  Saving
      Savings Account is an Account subclass that gives loyal customers a promotional interest rate of 0.35% Savings Accounts have a monthly fee of $5 and are waived if the account balance is greater than or equal to $300.00.
      Methods in transaction with parameters of type Account 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean AccountDatabase.add(Account account)
      Add method adds an Account object to the Account Database array.
      boolean AccountDatabase.deposit(Account account, double amount)
      Deposit method increases the balance in the account by specified value
      boolean AccountDatabase.remove(Account account)
      Remove method removes an Account object from the Account Database array.
      int AccountDatabase.withdrawal(Account account, double amount)
      Withdrawal method decreases the balance in the account by specified value
